element.name: DESCRIPTION
element.text:
This algorithm splits a lines layer using an additional points layer.
Points at a distance from a line lower than a given threshold will cause the be line to be splitted at the closest point between both.
A value from the point is added to the line. The user can select whether to add it to the segment finishing at the point or to the one starting at it

element.name: POINTS
element.text: Points used to split lines in the input lines layer

element.name: FIELD
element.text: Field from the points layer associated table with values to add to the resulting layer

element.name: METHOD
element.text: The following methods are available: * Add data before point. * Add data after point.

element.name: RESULT
element.text: The output layer with splitted lines.
